_1: Submit your SOL wallet address at wallet-submission. Please ensure you're using wallet providers that support Solana, such as Phantom or Solflare.
_2: Make sure to attend our weekly community AMA sessions and interact with the chat bot. Users holding this role will gain exclusive access to the Tier 2 lounge channel.
_3+: Stay active and responsible in the chat, and create quality content on Twitter. Collaborate with the moderators to find ways you can contribute and increase your Tier level.
